about_the_game:
Start your new life in Afterborne! A modern but classic style Action Adventure RPG where you will explore the after-life seeking a new purpose among God and the angels, Explore the mysterious spiritual realm and battle against corrupted angels, find hidden loot, gain wealth and new abilities to banish those that defy God's will.

Early Development Disclaimer

Please note that this game is currently in the early stages of development. Many features, visuals, and game-play mechanics are still being refined and are subject to significant change. Any screenshots or videos you see are proof-of-concept and may not represent the final quality or content of the game. We appreciate your interest and support as we continue to build and improve upon this experience!

Story:

You're a recently deceased human, you see a bright light in the cracks of your eyes, as you open them, you hear, “Well done good and faithful servant.” Saved in eternal life you now seek for a new purpose with God and equality as an Angel. Far beyond our Galaxy God created a new solar system, a new earth, founding a new mankind. With his love for his creation Theodore an Archangel and his legions of angels became jealous and were rebellious to God's new mankind creation. Theodore and his legions of fallen angels claimed the newly created planet from God and corrupted the planet. Michael the Archangel tasks you with a quest by going to New Eden in the Spiritual Realm and cleanse God’s new creation of corruption by Theodore and his legions of fallen angels.

Key Features:

  • Venture on a quest into the mysterious Spiritual Realm to fulfill the Will of God.

  • Combatant with fallen Angels and other defiers of God's Will.

  • Build your character around the way you want to play by collecting “ Enlightenment essences" which unlocks attributes.

  • The Attributes are, Fortitude- Increases your maximum health and health regen, increases Combat skills Attack and defense. Dexterity- Unlocking doors, disarming traps, unlocking hidden areas, and Agility Skill. Intelligence- Increases your maximum Mana and mana regen and governs the Divine Magic Skill.

  • Learn new Divine Magic Abilities to banish corruption.

    Equip a variety of gear to fit your playstyle.

  • Explore a realm of unique characters, creatures, challenges, and treasure.

  • Game-play is inspired heavily by Fantasy RPGs of the early 2000s and The Written Word of God. “Christian Fantasy RPG.”
